item.title: Hello World!
item.description: <!-- LB --> Made a new blog, as Jekyll, which I've used to generate the old one got too bloated for my taste. For a long time I wanted to try Luke Smith's simple and lightweight lb script, so I've forked it.doihfoshagoahgoidhoaih
